Phases.Name: Identify
Phases.Description: In this phase, organizations identify and understand their cybersecurity risks, assets, and vulnerabilities.

Phases.Name: Protect
Phases.Description: The protect phase focuses on implementing safeguards and security measures to prevent or reduce the impact of cybersecurity threats.

Phases.Name: Detect
Phases.Description: During this phase, organizations set up mechanisms to detect and monitor for cybersecurity incidents and anomalies.

Phases.Name: Respond
Phases.Description: In the respond phase, organizations develop strategies and procedures for responding to cybersecurity incidents in a timely and effective manner.

Phases.Name: Recover
Phases.Description: The recover phase involves planning and implementing measures to restore normal operations and services after a cybersecurity incident.
